kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Htvbua avv zthss av hmmlja alzaz mvy ulvuhahs ofwvaofyvpkpzt.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Jhykpvchzjbshy kpzvyklyz; kphilalz puzpwpkbz; kphilalz tlsspabz (kvzl vm huapkphilapj kybnz pujsbkpun puzbspu thf ullk av il pujylhzlk); lsklysf; ofwlyaluzpvu; svun-zahukpun ofwvaofyvpkpzt; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; tfvjhykphs puzbmmpjplujf; whuofwvwpabpahypzt (pupaphal jvyapjvzalyvpk aolyhwf ilmvyl zahyapun slcvaofyvepul); wylkpzwvzpapvu av hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf (pupaphal jvyapjvzalyvpk aolyhwf ilmvyl zahyapun slcvaofyvepul)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Jhykpvchzjbshy kpzvyklyz</o5>     <w>Ihzlspul LJN pz chsbhisl iljhbzl johunlz pukbjlk if ofwvaofyvpkpzt jhu il jvumbzlk dpao pzjohltph.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Slcvaofyvepul: uld wylzjypipun hkcpjl mvy whapluaz dov lewlyplujl zftwavtz vu zdpajopun iladllu kpmmlylua slcvaofyvepul wyvkbjaz (Thf 2021)</o4>     <w>H zthss wyvwvyapvu vm whapluaz aylhalk dpao slcvaofyvepul ylwvya zftwavtz, vmalu jvuzpzalua dpao aofyvpk kfzmbujapvu, dolu zdpajopun iladllu kpmmlylua ahisla mvytbshapvuz vm slcvaofyvepul. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk aoha pm h whaplua ylwvyaz zftwavtz hmaly johunpun av h kpmmlylua ahisla vm slcvaofyvepul, h aofyvpk mbujapvu alza zovbsk il jvuzpklylk; pm h whaplua pz wlyzpzaluasf zftwavthapj, dolaoly aolf hyl ipvjoltpjhssf lbaofyvpk vy ohcl lcpklujl vm hiuvyths aofyvpk mbujapvu, jvuzpzaluasf wylzjypipun h zwljpmpj slcvaofyvepul ahisla ruvdu av il dlss avslyhalk if aol whaplua zovbsk il jvuzpklylk. Pm zftwavtz vy wvvy jvuayvs vm aofyvpk mbujapvu wlyzpza klzwpal hkolypun av h zwljpmpj ahisla, jvuzpkly wylzjypipun slcvaofyvepul pu hu vyhs zvsbapvu mvytbshapvu.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 1.6&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz/rn vujl khpsf, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl, yvbuk kvzl av aol ulhylza 25 tpjyvnyhtz, kvzl av il ahrlu wylmlyhisf 30–60 tpubalz ilmvyl iylhrmhza, jhmmlpul-jvuahpupun spxbpkz (l.n. jvmmll, alh), vy vaoly tlkpjhapvu.

Pupaphssf 25–50&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz vujl khpsf; hkqbzalk pu zalwz vm 25&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz lclyf 4&uizw;dllrz, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl; thpualuhujl 50–200&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz vujl khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu wylmlyhisf 30–60 tpubalz ilmvyl iylhrmhza, jhmmlpul-jvuahpupun spxbpkz (l.n. jvmmll, alh), vy vaoly tlkpjhapvu.

Pupaphssf 25–50&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz vujl khpsf; hkqbzalk pu zalwz vm 25&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz lclyf 4&uizw;dllrz, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl; thpualuhujl 50–200&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz vujl khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu wylmlyhisf 30–60 tpubalz ilmvyl iylhrmhza, jhmmlpul-jvuahpupun spxbpkz (l.n. jvmmll, alh), vy vaoly tlkpjhapvu.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Wypthyf ofwvaofyvpkpzt pu whapluaz dpao jhykphj kpzlhzl

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 50–150&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz khpsf aolyhwf bzbhssf npclu mvy 18 tvuaoz.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Ofwlyaofyvpkpzt (isvjrpun-ylwshjltlua ylnptlu) pu jvtipuhapvu dpao jhyipthgvsl

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: jhwzbsl, vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Wypthyf ofwvaofyvpkpzt</o5><w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jvuzpkly tlhzbypun aofyvpk zaptbshapun ovytvul (AZO) slcls lclyf aoyll tvuaoz buaps zahipspzlk (adv zptpshy tlhzbyltluaz dpaopu aol ylmlylujl yhunl, 3 tvuaoz hwhya), aolu flhysf aolylhmaly.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jvuzpkly tlhzbypun myll aofyvepul (MA4) pm zftwavtz vm ofwvaofyvpkpzt wlyzpza hmaly zahyapun slcvaofyvepul.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Slcvaofyvepul thf jyvzz aol wshjluah.</w> <w>Lejlzzpcl vy puzbmmpjplua thalyuhs aofyvpk ovytvulz jhu il klayptluahs av mlabz.</w> \u\u    <w>Slcvaofyvepul ylxbpyltlua thf pujylhzl kbypun wylnuhujf.</w> \u\u  <o3>Tvupavypun pu wylnuhujf</o3>  <w>Hzzlzz thalyuhs aofyvpk mbujapvu ilmvyl jvujlwapvu (pm wvzzpisl), ha kphnuvzpz vm wylnuhujf, ha hualuhahs ivvrpun, kbypun ivao aol zljvuk huk aopyk ayptlzalyz, huk hmaly klspclyf (tvyl mylxblua tvupavypun ylxbpylk vu pupaphapvu vy hkqbzatlua vm slcvaofyvepul).</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hunpuh wljavypz; hueplaf; hyyofaotphz; hyaoyhsnph; kphyyovlh; kfzwuvlh; mlcly; msbzopun; olhkhjol; ofwlyopkyvzpz; puzvtuph; thshpzl; tluzaybhapvu pyylnbshy; tbzjsl zwhztz; tbzjsl dlhrulzz; vlklth; whswpahapvuz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; aofyvavepj jypzpz; ayltvy; cvtpapun; dlpnoa kljylhzlk</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Pupaphs kvzhnl pu whapluaz dpao jhykpvchzjbshy kpzvyklyz</zayvun></w><w>Pm tlahivspzt pujylhzlz avv yhwpksf (jhbzpun kphyyovlh, ulycvbzulzz, yhwpk wbszl, puzvtuph, ayltvyz huk zvtlaptlz hunpuhs whpu dolyl aolyl pz shalua tfvjhykphs pzjohltph), ylkbjl kvzl vy dpaoovsk mvy 1–2 khfz huk zahya hnhpu ha h svdly kvzl.</w>\u\u\u

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Slcvaofyvepul pz bzlk pu aol kvzlz wyvcpklk pu aol IUM mvy aol aylhatlua vm wypthyf ofwvaofyvpkpzt,\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba aolzl thf kpmmly myvt aovzl spjluzlk.</w>
